lead_paragraph: 2:31 a.m. | Updated The New York Times has more.
snippet: Under the proposed terms of the G.M. offering, the federal government will cut its holdings in the auto maker to below 50 percent, a big goal for the company.

headline.main: G.M. Seeks to Raise Up to $10.6 Billion in I.P.O.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Under the proposed terms of the G.M. offering, the federal government will cut its holdings in the auto maker to below 50 percent, a big goal for the company.
